SELECT tournament.id, tournament.name, LEFT(tournament.detail, 100) detail, tournament.start_time, host.id host, host.nick_name hostName, file.src hostHead FROM tournament INNER JOIN `user` host ON host.id = tournament.host INNER JOIN upload_file file ON file.id = host.head
tournament.status = #{ro.status}

SELECT tournament.*, host.nick_name hostName, file.src hostHead, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tournament_player WHERE tournament_id = #{id}) registerCount FROM tournament INNER JOIN `user` host ON host.id = tournament.host LEFT JOIN upload_file file ON file.id = host.head WHERE tournament.id = #{id}

SELECT player.id, player.nick_name, file.src avatar FROM `user` player LEFT JOIN upload_file file ON file.id = player.head INNER JOIN tournament_player ON tournament_player.player_id = player.id INNER JOIN tournament ON tournament.id = tournament_player.tournament_id WHERE tournament.id = #{id}
